show.title: PineTalk Podcast
show.subtitle: A Community Podcast
show.summary:
We discuss PINE64 hardware, software and open source in general.
Send in your questions!
A community ran podcast for the community.

Contact:
Email: pinetalk@pine64.org
Twitter: @TalkPine

title: S2E02: PineTalk - The big PP
subtitle: This episode is all about the big PinePhone Pro announcement of October 15th
summary:
In this episode the PinePhone Pro is discussed in length, with other news mixed in. Listen towards the end for a in-depth discussion of the the PinePhone Pro!

Music from Bensound.com and Zed (@itismezed)
https://soundcloud.com/kevinflynnretro

Edited by Zed
